fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Place a doll at another player's house at night. The following day phase, you will be able to impersonate their voice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While impersonated, your victim cannot speak normally in day chat. Instead, the host must relay their every message.
- Your victim also cannot send whispers.
- You can also send the host messages, which will be relayed to the day chat as if your victim sent them instead.
- With the Necronomicon, you will deal a Powerful Attack to your target at the end of the day.
